text: Daniel E. O'Day (died 1953) was an American football player and coach. He served as a player-coach at Georgetown University in Washington, D.C. in 1888. O'Day was the starting quarterback for the Hoyas in 1887 and 1888. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:1953 deaths Category:19th-century players of American football Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Player-coaches Category:Georgetown Hoyas football coaches Category:Georgetown Hoyas football players
title: Dan O'Day
